require "mw_theme_base"
theme_file = GetVariable("theme_file") or Theme.theme_file SetVariable("theme_file", theme_file)
function list_themes() t, e = utils.readdir(Theme.theme_dir.."*.lua") local res = {} for filename,v in pairs(t) do if Theme.theme_has_bad_sha(filename) then os.remove(Theme.theme_dir..filename) else res[filename] = filename:gsub("%.lua", ""):gsub("_", " ") end end return res end
function apply_theme(theme) CallPlugin("abc1a0944ae4af7586ce88dc", "pause") -- repaint buffer plugin for _, pid in ipairs(GetPluginList()) do if (pid ~= GetPluginID()) and GetPluginInfo(pid, 17) and (PluginSupports(pid, "Theme.b9315e040989d3f81f4328d6") == error_code.eOK) then local _, t = CallPlugin(pid, "Theme.get_theme") if t ~= theme then local a, b = CallPlugin(pid, "OnPluginThemeChange") if not ((a == error_code.eOK) and b) then CallPlugin(pid, "Theme.just_reloading") ReloadPlugin(pid) end end end end CallPlugin("abc1a0944ae4af7586ce88dc", "resume") -- repaint buffer plugin end
function choose_theme() res = utils.listbox("Which theme would you like to use?\r\n\r\nDo you have a custom theme that you want to share? Send it to Fiendish!", "Choose Theme", list_themes(), theme_file) if res then theme_file = res SetVariable("theme_file", theme_file) apply_theme(theme_file) end end
function OnPluginListChanged() apply_theme(theme_file) end
